title: D'hide chaps

properties.name: description
properties.value: Dragonhide chaps are a type of Ranged armour worn in the leg slot. Dragonhide chaps only require a certain Ranged level, depending on the type of dragonhide. This means combat pure players can take advantage of their bonuses. They can be crafted using two dragon leathers of appropriate colour.

content:
Dragonhide chaps are a type of Ranged armour worn in the leg slot. Dragonhide chaps only require a certain Ranged level, depending on the type of dragonhide. This means combat pure players can take advantage of their bonuses. They can be crafted using two dragon leathers of appropriate colour.

Types of d'hide chaps[edit | edit source]

  • Green d'hide chaps - Requires 40 Ranged to wear; trimmed and gold-trimmed versions are also available. Regular version may be crafted at 60 Crafting.
  • Blue d'hide chaps - Requires 50 Ranged to wear; trimmed and gold-trimmed versions are also available. Regular version may be crafted at 68 Crafting.
  • Red d'hide chaps - Requires 60 Ranged to wear. Can be crafted at 75 Crafting. Trimmed and gold-trimmed versions are also available.
  • Black d'hide chaps - Requires 70 Ranged to wear. Can be crafted at 82 Crafting. Trimmed and gold-trimmed versions are also available.

Blessed chaps[edit | edit source]

These all have the stats of Black d'hide chaps, with an additional +1 prayer bonus. They can be obtained from completing a level 3 or 4 Treasure Trail.

  • Guthix chaps
  • Saradomin chaps
  • Zamorak chaps
  • Armadyl chaps
  • Bandos chaps
  • Ancient chaps
 This page is used to distinguish between articles with similar names.
If an internal link led you to this disambiguation page, you may wish to change the link to point directly to the intended article.
rawContent:
'''Dragonhide chaps''' are a type of [[Ranged armour]] worn in the [[leg slot]]. Dragonhide chaps only require a certain [[Ranged]] level, depending on the type of dragonhide. This means [[combat pure]] players can take advantage of their bonuses. They can be [[Crafting|crafted]] using two [[dragon leather]]s of appropriate colour.

==Types of d'hide chaps==
*[[Green d'hide chaps]] - Requires 40 [[Ranged]] to wear; [[Green d'hide chaps (t)|trimmed]] and [[Green d'hide chaps (g)|gold-trimmed]] versions are also available. Regular version may be crafted at 60 [[Crafting]].
*[[Blue d'hide chaps]] - Requires 50 Ranged to wear; [[Blue d'hide chaps (t)|trimmed]] and [[Blue d'hide chaps (g)|gold-trimmed]] versions are also available. Regular version may be crafted at 68 Crafting.
*[[Red d'hide chaps]] - Requires 60 Ranged to wear. Can be crafted at 75 Crafting. [[Red d'hide chaps (t)|Trimmed]] and [[Red d'hide chaps (g)|gold-trimmed]] versions are also available.
*[[Black d'hide chaps]] - Requires 70 Ranged to wear. Can be crafted at 82 Crafting. [[Black d'hide chaps (t)|Trimmed]] and [[Black d'hide chaps (g)|gold-trimmed]] versions are also available.

==[[Blessed chaps]]==
These all have the stats of [[Black d'hide chaps]], with an additional +1 [[prayer bonus]]. They can be obtained from completing a level 3 or 4 [[Treasure Trail]].
*[[Guthix chaps]]
*[[Saradomin chaps]]
*[[Zamorak chaps]]
*[[Armadyl chaps]]
*[[Bandos chaps]]
*[[Ancient chaps]]

{{Disambig}}
